briefly.title: Briefly about me
briefly.text: I started being interested in programming back in the 8th grade and for a long time could not decide what exactly do I wanted to do , so at a good basic level I know several programming languages, including: C#, Python and JS. In the end, I chose Front-end development and studied HTML, CSS and JavaScript quite deeply.

education.title: My education
education.text:
At the moment, I am studying in Heigher School of Economics for Software engineering, graduation year - 2025
I am studying for free, thanks to 288 points for the RNE:
Math - 99
Computer Science - 96
Russian - 93
